name: Medical Device Control Software
description: Safety-critical software for medical imaging device with FDA regulatory requirements

inputs.projectVision: Real-time control software for advanced radiology imaging device. Must meet FDA 21 CFR Part 11 and IEC 62304 medical device software standards. High reliability, safety-critical system with extensive traceability and documentation requirements.

predefinedRisks.description: FDA approval delays due to documentation gaps
Real-time performance requirements for image processing
Team lacks medical device software experience

keyDeliverables: Vision document aligned with FDA requirements
Business case including regulatory approval costs
Initial use case model mapped to IEC 62304 requirements
Comprehensive risk list including safety hazards
Project plan accounting for FDA submission timeline
Layered architecture with safety-critical design patterns
Detailed use cases with full traceability to requirements
Risk mitigation including FMEA (Failure Mode and Effects Analysis)
Safety-critical code with full code reviews
Clinical beta testing at partner hospitals

rationale: RUP is ideal for medical device software due to its emphasis on documentation, traceability, and risk management. Three Elaboration iterations address complex safety and performance requirements. Heavy documentation aligns with FDA/IEC requirements. Extensive Transition phase handles regulatory approval and clinical validation.
